text:
e="preserve">Hugh Keays-Byrne (18 May 1947 – 1 December 2020) was an English-Australian actor and movie director. He moved to Australia in 1973. He was known for his roles as Toad in the 1974 movie "Stone", Toecutter in the 1979 movie "Mad Max", and Immortan Joe in the 2015 movie '. He was born in Srinagar, then-British India.
Keays-Byrne died on 1 December 2020 at the age of 73.
